title: The JBL Tune Buds are on Sale for Much Less than their Hundred-dollar Price
description: They come with active noise cancelling and lengthy battery life. The post The JBL Tune Buds are on Sale for Much Less than their Hundred-dollar Price appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: They come with active noise cancelling and lengthy battery life.
text: We’re at a point in time when most affordable wireless audio products need not compromise too much on specs and features to get you great sound at lower prices. Take for example the JBL Tune Buds, which are currently on sale right now for around $79, much less than their usual retail price. Available in four different colors, the JBL Tune Buds come with 10mm drivers with powerful-sounding bass, Bluetooth 5.3 with LE audio support for better power efficiency, active noise cancelling with smart ambient mode, a quad-mic setup for clearer phone calls, and up to 10 hours of usage on a single charge, with an additional 30 hours if you top up using the charging case. You can check them out below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
We’re at a point in time when most affordable wireless audio products need not compromise too much on specs and features to get you great sound at lower prices. Take for example the JBL Tune Buds, which are currently on sale right now for around $79, much less than their usual retail price.

Available in four different colors, the JBL Tune Buds come with 10mm drivers with powerful-sounding bass, Bluetooth 5.3 with LE audio support for better power efficiency, active noise cancelling with smart ambient mode, a quad-mic setup for clearer phone calls, and up to 10 hours of usage on a single charge, with an additional 30 hours if you top up using the charging case. You can check them out below.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
